boardgame.name: Thunderstone Advance: Die Türme des Verderbens
Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin
雷霆之石進階版: 遺跡之塔
boardgame.description: In Thunderstone: Heart of Doom, you had a chance to face Doom's very heart, the eighth Thunderstone, and defeat the ancient evil _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but winning that battle had unexpected consequences. It banished Doom, but also freed him to visit other worlds, so you advanced to the next world with him._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin, which is fully compatible with all previous Thunderstone offerings, is the next stop in your adventure. In Thunderstone Advance you build your party of heroes to defeat the dreaded Thunderstone Bearers in their dungeons or wilderness. The player who defeats the most valuable monsters will win the day, but beware _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; those monsters have all-new tricks up their sleeves, and victory will not come easy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin includes new rules, all new cards in new card frames, and a new village and dungeon board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thunderstone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thunderstone: Starter Set_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is for a complete set of Thunderstone Advance fully sleeved and in excellent condition. I am the original owner and it has been sleeved since the day I removed the shrink. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s currently setup epic style, and I have half of the cards stored in the spare boxes. The remaining are considered my play set and are in deck boxes by color for easy setup. However, both the stored and play sets are currently sorted so if Epic isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t your preference, it can be undone with a small amount of work. Truly, I adore this game and don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to part with it. However, due to various circumstances it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best to go to another loving home. Includes: Towers of Ruin Starter Set Roots of Corruption Caverns of Bane Worlds Collide Into the Abyss Numenera Avatars Fantasy Flight premium sleeves for all 2100+ cards (This took me hours. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll thank me for all that work!) Deckboxes for the different card types (only the play set, however. See details above. I can include deck boxes to cover the entire game for an additional $20) I assume the buyer will want all of the original boxes and inserts. As such, I estimate the shipping will be in the $30-$40 range to any US state for this massive beast. If you have any questions, please let me know!
